title: Bug Splat-Putting down a ward
body: So I don't know about you guys but every time i put down a ward, pink, trinket, or from the smite thing, i always crash and unable to get back in until the ward expires. I haven't tried it with other champs but it just started with {{champion:76}} . Any suggestions what is causing this?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hey Wolfe Scratch - 

Have you tried doing a client repair? 

To repair, you can do the following - 

* Run League of Legends
* Click on the '?' button that is located in the top right corner of the window
* Click Repair
* Wait. The repair function can take anywhere from 5 minutes to over 30 depending on the number of corrupt files it has to repair

If that doesn't work, and you're still experiencing this, please shoot me your r3dlogs from the game. This can be done by - 

Grabbing the files here:  C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs

Each file appears like this: [yyyy-mm-ddT15-40-03] _r3dlog.txt, where yyyy-mm-dd is the date of the match played.

Lemme know how this works out for you! ^-^
Oh this is a long time again. But i do remember that it did the trick. Thank you!
